long_description: Ride flat free! The 700c STOP Flats2 Tire Liners are made of durable, lightweight polyurethane and provide a protective layer between road hazards and the inner tubes. Hardened outer layer provides added protection from road debris, thorns, rim cuts, glass and nails; soft inner layer cushions inner tube. 700c STOP Flats2 Tire Liners install easily with no gooey mess; liners can be removed and used on another bike. Won't cause tire or tube damage or loosen spokes. Package of 2.
short_description: Ride flat free! The 700c STOP Flats2 Tire Liners are made of durable, lightweight polyurethane and provide a protective layer between road hazards and the inner tubes.
